title: [Epidemiology] Prospective cohort study (n=12,197 w/ 6104 conceptions) finds almost 20% of US women experienced a miscarriage. Risk was highest in late August at 1.3 (1.1, 1.6), and <8 weeks since the last menstrual period date 1.4 (1.2, 1.8). Associations were also stronger in the South and Midwest.
